5#include "src/base/bounded-page-allocator.h"
6
7namespace v8 {
8namespace base {
9
10BoundedPageAllocator::BoundedPageAllocator(
11 v8::PageAllocator* page_allocator, Address start, size_t size,
12 size_t allocate_page_size, PageInitializationMode page_initialization_mode,
13 PageFreeingMode page_freeing_mode)
14 : allocate_page_size_(allocate_page_size),
15 commit_page_size_(page_allocator->CommitPageSize()),
16 page_allocator_(page_allocator),
17 region_allocator_(start, size, allocate_page_size_),
18 page_initialization_mode_(page_initialization_mode),
19 page_freeing_mode_(page_freeing_mode) {
20 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(page_allocator);
21 DCHECK(IsAligned(allocate_page_size, page_allocator->AllocatePageSize()));
22 DCHECK(IsAligned(allocate_page_size_, commit_page_size_));
23}
24
25BoundedPageAllocator::Address BoundedPageAllocator::begin() const {
26 return region_allocator_.begin();
27}
28
29size_t BoundedPageAllocator::size() const { return region_allocator_.size(); }
30
31void* BoundedPageAllocator::AllocatePages(void* hint, size_t size,
32 size_t alignment,
33 PageAllocator::Permission access) {
34 MutexGuard guard(&mutex_);
35 DCHECK(IsAligned(alignment, region_allocator_.page_size()));
36 DCHECK(IsAligned(alignment, allocate_page_size_));
37
38 Address address = RegionAllocator::kAllocationFailure;
39
40 Address hint_address = reinterpret_cast<Address>(hint);
41 if (hint_address && IsAligned(hint_address, alignment) &&
42 region_allocator_.contains(hint_address, size)) {
43 if (region_allocator_.AllocateRegionAt(hint_address, size)) {
44 address = hint_address;
45 }
46 }
47
48 if (address == RegionAllocator::kAllocationFailure) {
49 if (alignment <= allocate_page_size_) {
50 // TODO(ishell): Consider using randomized version here.
51 address = region_allocator_.AllocateRegion(size);
52 } else {
53 address = region_allocator_.AllocateAlignedRegion(size, alignment);
54 }
55 }
56
57 if (address == RegionAllocator::kAllocationFailure) {
58 return nullptr;
59 }
60
61 void* ptr = reinterpret_cast<void*>(address);
62 // It's assumed that free regions are in kNoAccess/kNoAccessWillJitLater
63 // state.
64 if (access == PageAllocator::kNoAccess ||
65 access == PageAllocator::kNoAccessWillJitLater) {
66 return ptr;
67 }
68
69 if (page_initialization_mode_ == PageInitializationMode::kRecommitOnly) {
70 if (page_allocator_->RecommitPages(ptr, size, access)) {
71 return ptr;
72 }
73 } else {
74 if (page_allocator_->SetPermissions(ptr, size, access)) {
75 return ptr;
76 }
77 }
78
79 // This most likely means that we ran out of memory.
80 CHECK_EQ(region_allocator_.FreeRegion(address), size);
81 return nullptr;
82}
83
84bool BoundedPageAllocator::AllocatePagesAt(Address address, size_t size,
85 PageAllocator::Permission access) {
86 DCHECK(IsAligned(address, allocate_page_size_));
87 DCHECK(IsAligned(size, allocate_page_size_));
88
89 {
90 MutexGuard guard(&mutex_);
91 DCHECK(region_allocator_.contains(address, size));
92
93 if (!region_allocator_.AllocateRegionAt(address, size)) {
94 return false;
95 }
96 }
97
98 void* ptr = reinterpret_cast<void*>(address);
99 if (!page_allocator_->SetPermissions(ptr, size, access)) {
100 // This most likely means that we ran out of memory.
101 CHECK_EQ(region_allocator_.FreeRegion(address), size);
102 return false;
103 }
104
105 return true;
106}
107
108bool BoundedPageAllocator::ReserveForSharedMemoryMapping(void* ptr,
109 size_t size) {
110 Address address = reinterpret_cast<Address>(ptr);
111 DCHECK(IsAligned(address, allocate_page_size_));
112 DCHECK(IsAligned(size, commit_page_size_));
113
114 {
115 MutexGuard guard(&mutex_);
116 DCHECK(region_allocator_.contains(address, size));
117
118 // Region allocator requires page size rather than commit size so just over-
119 // allocate there since any extra space couldn't be used anyway.
120 size_t region_size = RoundUp(size, allocate_page_size_);
121 if (!region_allocator_.AllocateRegionAt(
122 address, region_size, RegionAllocator::RegionState::kExcluded)) {
123 return false;
124 }
125 }
126
127 return page_allocator_->SetPermissions(ptr, size,
128 PageAllocator::Permission::kNoAccess);
129}
130
131bool BoundedPageAllocator::FreePages(void* raw_address, size_t size) {
132 MutexGuard guard(&mutex_);
133
134 Address address = reinterpret_cast<Address>(raw_address);
135 CHECK_EQ(size, region_allocator_.FreeRegion(address));
136 if (page_initialization_mode_ ==
137 PageInitializationMode::kAllocatedPagesMustBeZeroInitialized) {
138 DCHECK_NE(page_freeing_mode_, PageFreeingMode::kDiscard);
139 // When we are required to return zero-initialized pages, we decommit the
140 // pages here, which will cause any wired pages to be removed by the OS.
141 return page_allocator_->DecommitPages(raw_address, size);
142 }
143 if (page_freeing_mode_ == PageFreeingMode::kMakeInaccessible) {
144 DCHECK_EQ(page_initialization_mode_,
145 PageInitializationMode::kAllocatedPagesCanBeUninitialized);
146 return page_allocator_->SetPermissions(raw_address, size,
147 PageAllocator::kNoAccess);
148 }
149 CHECK_EQ(page_freeing_mode_, PageFreeingMode::kDiscard);
150 return page_allocator_->DiscardSystemPages(raw_address, size);
151}
152
153bool BoundedPageAllocator::ReleasePages(void* raw_address, size_t size,
154 size_t new_size) {
155 Address address = reinterpret_cast<Address>(raw_address);
156 DCHECK(IsAligned(address, allocate_page_size_));
157
158 DCHECK_LT(new_size, size);
159 DCHECK(IsAligned(size - new_size, commit_page_size_));
160
161 // This must be held until the page permissions are updated.
162 MutexGuard guard(&mutex_);
163
164 // Check if we freed any allocatable pages by this release.
165 size_t allocated_size = RoundUp(size, allocate_page_size_);
166 size_t new_allocated_size = RoundUp(new_size, allocate_page_size_);
167
168#ifdef DEBUG
169 {
170 // There must be an allocated region at given |address| of a size not
171 // smaller than |size|.
172 DCHECK_EQ(allocated_size, region_allocator_.CheckRegion(address));
173 }
174#endif
175
176 if (new_allocated_size < allocated_size) {
177 region_allocator_.TrimRegion(address, new_allocated_size);
178 }
179
180 // Keep the region in "used" state just uncommit some pages.
181 void* free_address = reinterpret_cast<void*>(address + new_size);
182 size_t free_size = size - new_size;
183 if (page_initialization_mode_ ==
184 PageInitializationMode::kAllocatedPagesMustBeZeroInitialized) {
185 DCHECK_NE(page_freeing_mode_, PageFreeingMode::kDiscard);
186 // See comment in FreePages().
187 return (page_allocator_->DecommitPages(free_address, free_size));
188 }
189 if (page_freeing_mode_ == PageFreeingMode::kMakeInaccessible) {
190 DCHECK_EQ(page_initialization_mode_,
191 PageInitializationMode::kAllocatedPagesCanBeUninitialized);
192 return page_allocator_->SetPermissions(free_address, free_size,
193 PageAllocator::kNoAccess);
194 }
195 CHECK_EQ(page_freeing_mode_, PageFreeingMode::kDiscard);
196 return page_allocator_->DiscardSystemPages(free_address, free_size);
197}
198
199bool BoundedPageAllocator::SetPermissions(void* address, size_t size,
200 PageAllocator::Permission access) {
201 DCHECK(IsAligned(reinterpret_cast<Address>(address), commit_page_size_));
202 DCHECK(IsAligned(size, commit_page_size_));
203 DCHECK(region_allocator_.contains(reinterpret_cast<Address>(address), size));
204 return page_allocator_->SetPermissions(address, size, access);
205}
206
207bool BoundedPageAllocator::RecommitPages(void* address, size_t size,
208 PageAllocator::Permission access) {
209 DCHECK(IsAligned(reinterpret_cast<Address>(address), commit_page_size_));
210 DCHECK(IsAligned(size, commit_page_size_));
211 DCHECK(region_allocator_.contains(reinterpret_cast<Address>(address), size));
212 return page_allocator_->RecommitPages(address, size, access);
213}
214
215bool BoundedPageAllocator::DiscardSystemPages(void* address, size_t size) {
216 return page_allocator_->DiscardSystemPages(address, size);
217}
218
219bool BoundedPageAllocator::DecommitPages(void* address, size_t size) {
220 return page_allocator_->DecommitPages(address, size);
221}
222
223} // namespace base
224} // namespace v8
